name: super-rod
effect: Used to find Pokémon on the Super Rod list for an area, which are generally the best available there.
short_effect: Used to catch Pokémon in bodies of water.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
flavor_text.platinum: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it by any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.
